question: What are the features of Flow Designer? (Choose three.)

options.B: Call a flow from another flow.
options.C: Test a flow using the 'Run as' feature.
options.E: Run a flow from a Catalog item.

question: How is access to Application Menus and Modules controlled?
What is the ServiceNow App Repository?

options.C: A collection of files in Git

question: What happens to the List view when a new field is added to an existing table?

options.C: The new field is not added to the List view
options.D: A List View is created with the new field

question: ExportItem table extends Item table (ItemName, ItemQty) with ItemCountry. Which fields are in ExportItem?
What data types of Flow Variables are supported to store record data? (Choose three.)
Which of the following objects does a Before Business Rule have access to in a script?
Which options are strategies for debugging client-side scripts? (Choose two.)
In a privately-scoped application, which methods are used for logging messages in server-side scripts? (Choose two.)
When creating an application through the Guided Application Creator, what are the options for creating a table? (Choose three.)

options.C: Create a table from a template

question: Which one of the following database operations can be controlled with Application Access? (Choose two.)
Which is an example of when an application might use a Scheduled Script Execution (Scheduled Job)?

options.B: Query the database every day to look for unassigned records.

question: What field type would you select if you want to query records from another table on a form?
What functionality is supported by Flow Designer?

options.C: Call a subflow from a flow.

question: What is a characteristic of Modules?

options.A: Must be associated with a table
options.C: Every Module must be part of an Application Menu.

question: Which method can be used to install an application on a ServiceNow instance? (Choose three.)
Which is the correct Link Type for a module opening a Record Producer UI?
What is the most common role that has access to almost all platform features?
Which items are valid UI Action types in ServiceNow? (Choose three.)
What occurs when an existing table is extended in ServiceNow?

options.D: The new table inherits the functionality built into the parent table.

question: App 'My App' table 'MyAppTable' (Can delete: Not selected, Allow configuration: Selected). Which is true?

options.A: Other scoped app developer can write Business Rule to delete records
options.B: Developer in the My App scope can write a Business Rule to successfully delete records
options.C: Any developer can write a Business Rule to delete records
options.D: No Business Rule can be written to delete records

explanation: Application Access (Can Delete) restricts other scopes. Artifacts within the same scope are not restricted by Application Access settings.

question: Which one of the following is true about client-side scripted security?

options.A: Client-side scripts have access to the GlideUser (g_user) methods
options.D: Access to both gs and g_user

question: How can Administrators expand the list of supported file types for code search in ServiceNow Studio?

options.C: Create a new code search group
options.D: By adding new file types to a custom search group

question: What happens if a record producer script aborts the record generation process?

options.A: Record creation displays an error message to the user
options.B: Record not generated in Item Produced Record table

question: What is a function of an update set in ServiceNow Studio?

options.D: To group configuration changes for transfer between instances

question: How can an application respond to an Event triggered by gs.eventQueue()? (Choose two.)
What is a scoped application that contains Flow Designer actions tailored for a specific application?
What is a reason for building a custom application? (Choose two.)

options.C: To create a custom integration for a 3rd party system
options.D: To fulfill a specific use case on internal processes

question: What can a developer do with REST API Explorer? (Choose two.)

options.D: Create sample code for sending REST requests to ServiceNow

question: Which table stores details of customizations included in an update set?
What is the default module name when a new application table is created?

options.B: Plural form of the application name

question: Which feature can be used to add instructions to a form?
What is displayed to delegated developers to package changes for deployment in ServiceNow Studio?
What does Application Scoping provide? (Choose two.)

options.B: A namespace (prefix and scope name) to prevent name collisions.
options.D: A means to control how scripts from other scopes can alter tables.

question: Why are application files important? (Choose two.)

options.B: They define the app logic and behavior.
options.C: They restrict access to the application.

question: What happens when an existing table is extended? (Choose two.)

options.C: Parent table Access Controls are evaluated.
options.E: The new table inherits all the fields from the parent table.
options.F: Dictionary entries include records for parent fields

question: When can the value 'Protected' be leveraged in a Protection Policy for a Script Include?

options.C: The application is downloaded from the ServiceNow App Store

question: When configuring a REST Message, what syntax indicates passing a variable during a function call?
What does the 'Read-only' protection policy for Script Includes allow?

options.C: Application developers can view the script logic but not change it.

question: Which Client-side scoped API class can be used as a replacement for GlideRecord?
What Link type creates a module that opens a Record Producer UI instead of a Form UI?
An app developer wants to review the scripts, reports, and other application artifacts included in a published app. What steps are taken?

options.C: Examine the Application Files Related List in the application to be published
